definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: having foreskin, i.e. uncircumcised;—´[[ע]] Ex 12:48 + 5 t.; cstr. [[עֶ֫רֶל]] Ez Eze 44:9, Eze 44:9; [[עֲרַל]] Ex 6:12, Ex 6:30; f. [[עֲרִלָה]] Je 6:10; pl. [[עֲרִלִים]] Le 19:23 + 20 t.; cstr. [[עַרְלֵי]] Je 9:25 + 2 t.;—uncircumcised person Ex 12:48, Jos 5:7 (P), Philistines Ju Jdg 14:3, Jdg 15:18, 1Sa 14:6, 1Sa 17:26, 1Sa 17:36, 1Sa 31:4, 2Sa 1:20, 1Ch 10:4; of other nations Is 52:1, Je 9:25; esp. as slain Ez Eze 28:10, Eze 31:18, Eze 32:19 + 9 t. 32; in v:Eze 32:27 rd. [[מֵעוֹלָם]] so Hi and most (v. on meaning Toy:31, 18); [[עָרֵל זָכָר]] uncircumcised male Ge 17:14 (P); [[בָּשָׂר]] ´[[ע]] Ez Eze 44:7, Eze 44:9 uncircumcised of flesh; fig. of fruit trees Le 19:23 (cf. [[[עָרַל]]] supr.); [[שְׂפָתַיִם]] ´[[ע]] fig. of incapacity to speak Ex 6:12, Ex 6:30; of character, [[לב]] ´[[ע]] Je 9:25, Ez Eze 44:7, Eze 44:9, cf. [[לֵבָבָם הֶעָרֵל]] Le 26:41 (P), [[עֲרֵלָה אָזְנָם]] Je 6:10 their ear is uncircumcised (unreceptive).
